sen.j: 山岡 景佐（やまおか かげすけ）は、戦国時代 (日本)の武将。
sen.e: Kagesuke YAMAOKA was a busho (Japanese military commander) in the Sengoku period.

sen.j: 山岡景隆の実弟である。
sen.e: He was a younger brother of Kagetaka YAMAOKA.

sen.j: はじめ六角義秀に仕えた。
sen.e: At first he served Yoshihide Rokkaku.

sen.e: It is said that when Nobunaga died in the Honno-ji Incident, he helped Ieyasu TOKUGAWA to reach his home by way of Iga Province.

sen.j: 天正11年（1583年）の賤ヶ岳の戦いでは、柴田勝家に味方した。
sen.e: During the Battle of Shizugatake in 1583, he took Katsuie SHIBATA's side.
During the Battle of Shizugatake in 1583, he supported Katsuie SHIBATA.
